category_id.description: Unique identifier for the category to which this interest belongs.

list_id.description: Unique identifier for the list associated with this interest.

id.description: Unique identifier for this specific interest.

name.description: Name or label of the interest.

subscriber_count.description: Number of subscribers who have selected this interest.

display_order.description: Numeric value representing the display order of this interest within its category.
